metadata.title: CVE-2024-26673 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_ct: sanitize layer 3 and 4 protocol number in customexpectations - Disallow families other than NFPROTO_{IPV4,IPV6,INET}. -Disallow layer 4 protocol with no ports, since destination port is amandatory attribute for this object.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
